svg.title: E0DC FEAR â€” Negative Expected Value
svg.desc: Storm cloud with lightning and downward trend arrow indicating negative expected value.

rdf:Description.dc:title: FEAR (E0DC)
rdf:Description.dc:description: Canonical glyph for anticipatory negative expectation. Represents compressive closure of possibility-space with a single feared outcome breaching containment. Triggers protective protocols, tempo reduction, contingency buffering, and empathy-injection in compliant swarm implementations.
